layout.title: NADAV.AI | Full-Stack AI Developer
layout.description: Nadav Cohen - Full-Stack Developer who builds everything with AI. Web apps, enterprise systems, AI agents & automation. 8+ production apps, 80 AI Skills.
layout.ogDescription: Building everything with AI. 8+ production apps, 80 AI Skills, 38+ agents.

hero.description: Not coding the traditional way. Using AI to build apps, systems and tech solutions at the highest level - fast, smart, no compromises.

services.title: Premium
services.description: Every service is AI-powered - what takes others weeks, I do in days. No compromises on quality.
services.s1Description: Full web apps from scratch with AI. What a full team builds in months - I build in days. Frontend, Backend, Database, Deploy - all included.
services.s2Description: Smart bots and agents that work 24/7. Full process automation - from chatbots to complex decision systems.
services.s3Description: From idea to live product in days. Fast validation, early launch, and lightning iterations with AI.
services.addDesc2: 1-on-1, workshops, how to build with AI
services.addDesc3: Optimization, adding AI to existing systems

projects.title: What I
projects.description: Every project built from scratch with AI - production apps, enterprise systems, and mobile apps. Here's the proof.
projects.p1: Enterprise franchise management system - 149 pages, 111 tables, 38 Edge Functions. Branch, order, inventory, employee management and advanced reports.
projects.p2: Delivery management PWA with full offline support. Smart sync, IndexedDB, and operation queue for working without connection.
projects.p3: Shift management system with Drag & Drop, Push notifications, and interactive scheduling. 154 components, 25 hooks.
projects.p4: Order management system with iOS app. Entity Factory pattern, Result(T,E) for error handling, and Zod validation.
projects.p5: Cash register management system - register closing, deposits, branch management. PWA with Offline-first, IndexedDB, and full Hebrew support.
projects.p6: Mobile sports chat app - Flutter with 28 modules: chats, voice rooms, watch parties, predictions and games.
projects.p7: Code audit engine with 579 gates, auto-healing, automatic technology detection, and 10x7 visual matrix. TypeScript + Bun.
projects.p8: Israeli finance app with full Hebrew RTL support. Expense management, budgets, and interactive charts.

process.title: How It
process.description: A transparent, fast workflow with no surprises. From initial idea to live product.
process.step1Desc: Understanding what you need, your goals, and your deadline. No bureaucracy.
process.step2Desc: Choosing the perfect tools, models and architecture for the project.
process.step3Desc: AI works 10x faster. What takes a month - done in days.
process.step4Desc: Deploy, testing, and optimization. Product ready, live, working.

testimonials.title: What People
testimonials.description: Clients who built with me - and never stopped telling.
testimonials.t1Text: Nadav built me a full Enterprise-level management system - 149 pages, 111 tables. What a team of 5 would do in months, he delivered in days. Impressive.
testimonials.t2Text: We added a PWA app with full Offline-first - smart sync, IndexedDB, everything works perfectly even without connection. 8+ production apps speak for themselves.
testimonials.t3Text: 80 AI Skills, 38+ agents, a code audit engine with 579 gates - Nadav's understanding of AI is on another level. Our project went live within a week.

blog.title: What I
blog.description: Insights, tips, and field analysis - about AI, development, and the future of technology.
blog.b1Title: Why AI is changing the game for freelancers
blog.b1Excerpt: A year ago I was building apps in 3 months. Today? Same quality level in 3 days. This is how AI changed my life as a developer.
blog.b2Title: 8 production apps in one year - how I did it
blog.b2Excerpt: The secret? Not traditional code. Using 80 AI Skills, smart agents, and the APEX engine with 579 gates ensuring everything is top quality.
blog.b3Title: Claude Code vs Cursor - what's really better for developers?
blog.b3Excerpt: I tried both in depth. Here are the real differences, what works better, and where each one wins.
blog.b4Excerpt: Mistake #1: Thinking AI replaces you. It doesn't. It amplifies you 10x. Here's how to use it right.
blog.b5Title: The path from zero to AI freelancer in 2026
blog.b5Excerpt: A detailed action plan: what to learn, which tools to know, and how to build a convincing portfolio - even with no prior experience.
blog.b6Title: Supabase + Next.js - the perfect stack for 2026
blog.b6Excerpt: Why I choose Supabase over Firebase, how to properly work with RLS, and tips for Enterprise-level performance.

youtube.title: My
youtube.description: Tutorials, demos, and tips in Hebrew - about development with AI. Subscribe to the channel.
youtube.v1Title: How I built an Enterprise app with AI in a week
youtube.v1Desc: Live demo of building Mexicani - a franchise management system with 149 pages and 111 tables. All with Claude Code.
youtube.v2Desc: From installation to production. How to use Claude Code most effectively, what Skills are, and how to write prompts that work.
youtube.v3Title: Next.js 16 - What's new and why it matters
youtube.v3Desc: Turbopack, React 19.2, View Transitions, Cache Components. In-depth analysis of all new features.
youtube.v4Title: Supabase RLS - Proper security in 5 minutes
youtube.v4Desc: Row Level Security is a must. Shows exactly how to write policies that protect your data.
youtube.v5Title: APEX Engine - Code audit engine with 579 Gates
youtube.v5Desc: Demo of the automated code review system I built. TypeScript + Bun, 10x7 visual matrix, auto-healing.
youtube.v6Title: PWA Offline-First - How I built an app that works without internet
youtube.v6Desc: Service Workers, IndexedDB, Background Sync - the complete guide to building apps that always work.

guides.title: Guides
guides.description: Practical guides, videos, and tips - all free. So you can build with AI too.
guides.g1Title: How I built a 149-page system with AI
guides.g1Desc: Case Study: Mexicani system - 149 pages, 111 tables, 38 Edge Functions. How AI changed the building process.
guides.g2Desc: How I built a PWA app with IndexedDB, smart sync, and an operation queue - that works even without internet.
guides.g3Desc: How I built 73 skills for Claude Code: architecture, 70-Gate Matrix, auto-heal, and research workflows.
guides.g4Desc: The path from idea to live app in Flutter: Clean Architecture, Riverpod, Firebase, and Capacitor.

resources.title: Free
resources.description: Repositories, templates, and tools I give away for free. Take, use, enjoy.
resources.r1Desc: Engine for building Claude Code skills with 70-Gate matrix, auto-heal, and research-first workflows. Web + Mobile.
resources.r2Desc: Project management app for vibe coders. React Native, Expo, 14 OMEGA Skills, Glassmorphism UI.
resources.r3Desc: 80 skills system: 20 APEX (Web), 25 Flutter (Mobile), 10 Utility, 5 Agent Skills. Full development automation.
resources.r4Desc: AI agent system with CrewAI, Ollama (local models), ChromaDB for memory, and Docker. Local AGI on your computer.
resources.r5Desc: Code audit engine with 579 gates, auto-healing, automatic technology detection, and 10x7 visual matrix.

news.title: News
news.description: What's new in the AI world, new tools, important updates, and what I'm using now.
news.n1Desc: Reached 80 custom skills for Claude Code: 20 APEX (Web), 25 Flutter (Mobile), 10 Utility, 5 Agent Skills, and more.
news.n2Desc: Code audit engine with 579 gates and 10x7 visual matrix. Auto-healing, automatic technology detection, and detailed reports.
news.n3Desc: Released Singularity Forge - an engine for building skills with 70-Gate Matrix, auto-heal, and research workflows. Open to everyone.
